Memory Name.description: The name of the DDR4 memory product.

Generation.description: The generation of the DDR4 memory.

value_dict.DDR4: DDR4 is the fourth generation of double data rate (DDR) synchronous dynamic random-access (SDRAM) memories.

Latency (ns).description: The latency of the DDR4 memory in nanoseconds.

Read Uncached (GB/s).description: The uncached read speed of the DDR4 memory in Gigabytes per second.

Write (GB/s).description: The write speed of the DDR4 memory in Gigabytes per second.

Price (USD).description: The price of the DDR4 memory in US dollars.

prompt.role_prompt: You are an expert in computer hardware and pricing.
prompt.task_prompt: Based on the features of the DDR4 memory, please predict the price in USD.
prompt.answer_prompt: The predicted price in USD is ______.
